column4: 3 - require closing (or work from home) for all-but-essential workplaces (eg grocery stores, doctors)

column4: 4 - restrictions on gatherings of 10 people or less

column4: 0 - no measures

column4: 1 - recommend not leaving house

column4: 2 - require not leaving house with exceptions for daily exercise, grocery shopping, and 'essential' trips

column4: 4 - ban on all regions or total border closure

column4: 2- coordinated public information campaign (eg across traditional and social media)

column4: 2 - testing of anyone showing Covid-19 symptoms

column4: 3 - open public testing (eg "drive through" testing available to asymptomatic people)

column4: 1 - limited contact tracing; not done for all cases

column4: 0 - No policy

column4: 3 - Required in all shared/public spaces outside the home with other people present or all situations when social distancing not possible

column4: 4 - Required outside the home at all times regardless of location or presence of other people
